title: Jashin (Megami) ni Yobarete Isekai Ten’i ~Inmon Majutsushi no Sokuochi Haremu Raifu~ - Novel Updates
tags: Dark   Evil Gods   Fantasy World   First-time Interc**rse   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Hypnotism   Male Protagonist   Mind Control   Perverted Protagonist   R-18   R*pe   Special Abilities   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: 黒山 羊
description:
Ookame Yuya was abruptly summoned to another world by the evil god (goddess) Elias. To have revenge on the people of the world who banished her, Elias granted Yuya a strong aphrodisiac divine protection .

Having received the divine protection,  Yuya bares his poisonous fangs on Elias from the start, and makes her his sex slave.

This is the story about the harem life of a man whose only redeeming point is his strong vitality with the instantly-fallen girls……>
